column4: hey, I am looking for some help. I can't seem to instal ubuntu right and every time I do I get a permissions error. can anyone help? thanks.
How are you installing it?
Installer CD?
At what part are you getting these errors?
So are you still in Windows?
Can you take a screenshot and upload it somewhere for us to see?
Can you pastebin the log please?
do you know whats wrong?
Since yiou are running Windows 7, try running it as Administrator
No problem, I don't know if this will fix it though.
ok, well if it doesn't then I might have to check youtube or something.
It's either not able to put files there because it needs to be run as admin, or a file is in use.
ok, it might be the file is in use. that happens a lot to me
If that is the case, try restarting the computer. I know it sounds dumb and you probally did that already, but it could help.
yeah I did that before, but that would help :P
the error poped up again lol
what file would it be using?
I don't know
ok, thanks for helping though.
No problem, ask again in the channel, someone else may be able to help
Ok, I have to leave in 12 minutes so idk if I had time.
